title: Miniature Portrait of a Gentleman
provenance_text:
Thomas E. Kirby, New York, NY [1]; purchased by Herbet DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, May 1, 1919; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927. 
NOTES: [1] The documentation says that Herbert DuPuy purchased this item "from Thomas E. Kirby of the American Art Association." It is unclear if this item was sold from Kirby's personal collection, or the American Art Association stock, or if this detail is mentioned because it was Kirby's place of employment alone.
